verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: Of its occurrence, there is no denial.
verse.verse_4: When the earth is shaken with a shock.
verse.verse_5: And the mountains are crushed and crumbled.
verse.verse_8: Those on the Right-what of those on the Right?
verse.verse_9: And those on the Left-what of those on the Left?
verse.verse_14: And a small band from the latecomers.
verse.verse_16: Reclining on them, facing one another.
verse.verse_17: Serving them will be immortalized youth.
verse.verse_18: With cups, pitchers, and sparkling drinks.
verse.verse_19: Causing them neither headache, nor intoxication.
verse.verse_21: And meat of birds that they may desire.
verse.verse_24: As a reward for what they used to do.
verse.verse_25: Therein they will hear no nonsense, and no accusations.
verse.verse_27: And those on the Right-what of those on the Right?
verse.verse_35: We have created them of special creation.
verse.verse_40: And a throng from the latecomers.
verse.verse_41: And those on the Left-what of those on the Left?
verse.verse_42: Amid searing wind and boiling water.
verse.verse_43: And a shadow of thick smoke.
verse.verse_45: They had lived before that in luxury.
verse.verse_46: And they used to persist in immense wrongdoing.
verse.verse_47: And they used to say, "When we are dead and turned into dust and bones, are we to be resurrected?
verse.verse_50: Will be gathered for the appointment of a familiar Day."
verse.verse_51: Then you, you misguided, who deny the truth.
verse.verse_52: Will be eating from the Tree of Bitterness.
verse.verse_53: Will be filling your bellies with it.
verse.verse_54: Will be drinking on top of it boiling water.
verse.verse_56: That is their hospitality on the Day of Retribution.
verse.verse_57: We created you-if only you would believe!
verse.verse_58: Have you seen what you ejaculate?
verse.verse_59: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creator?
verse.verse_60: We have decreed death among you, and We will not be outstripped.
verse.verse_61: In replacing you with your likes, and transforming you into what you do not know.
verse.verse_62: You have known the first formation; if only you would remember.
verse.verse_63: Have you seen what you cultivate?
verse.verse_64: Is it you who make it grow, or are We the Grower?
verse.verse_65: If We will, We can turn it into rubble; then you will lament.
verse.verse_68: Have you seen the water you drink?
verse.verse_69: Is it you who sent it down from the clouds, or are We the Sender?
verse.verse_70: If We will, We can make it salty. Will you not be thankful?
verse.verse_71: Have you seen the fire you kindle?
verse.verse_72: Is it you who produce its tree, or are We the Producer?
verse.verse_73: We have made it a reminder, and a comfort for the users.
verse.verse_74: So glorify the Name of your Great Lord.
verse.verse_75: I swear by the locations of the stars.
verse.verse_76: It is an oath, if you only knew, that is tremendous.
verse.verse_79: None can grasp it except the purified.
verse.verse_80: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
verse.verse_81: Is it this discourse that you take so lightly?
verse.verse_82: And you make it your livelihood to deny it?
verse.verse_83: So when it has reached the throat.
verse.verse_85: We are nearer to it than you are, but you do not see.
verse.verse_86: If you are not held to account.
verse.verse_87: Then bring it back, if you are truthful.
verse.verse_88: But if he is one of those brought near.
verse.verse_89: Then happiness, and flowers, and Garden of Delights.
verse.verse_90: And if he is one of those on the Right.
verse.verse_91: Then, "Peace upon you," from those on the Right.
verse.verse_92: But if he is one of the deniers, the mistaken.
verse.verse_96: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Magnificent
